title: Khawiah pawh Chhandamtu min hruai zel langin
lyrics:
Khawiah pawh Chhandamtu min hruai zel langin,
I ban vuan zelin i kiangah min awmtir la;
Kawng thim leh hlauhawmah pawh min hruaina'piangah,
Khawiah pawh Chhandamtu, ka zui zel ang che.

Khawiah pawh ka Chhandamtu duh,
Ka zui zel ang che, ka zui zel ang che;
Khawiah pawh ka Chhandamtu duh,
Ka zui zel ang che.

Khawiah pawh Chhandamtu, i hmel duhawm chuan,
Min tichakin min muan se, suala bo lovin;
Ka kawng hlauhawm hle mah se, he khawvelah hian,
Thlemna nasa mah se, ka zui zel ang che.

Khawiah pawh Chhandamtu, hei chauh hi ka ngen,
Kawng thimah hian min vengin, ka bo phal suh la;
Thlemnaten min beih laiin, Lalpa min pui la,
Min nei rawh Chhandamtu, i ta chauh ka ni.
